record Revenue at
130.7 million so I'd like to start by

as well as strong demand from our Auto
EV defense errow and Lifey science's
markets the combination of the

targeted markets more than offset the
measurable 26% decline we experienced in
semi we believe that delivering growth

test and process Technology Solutions

the
year specifically Revenue growth in Auto

that are used to qualify infotainment
systems for

battery packs that are used in various
end products not just
EVS our flying probe automated test
systems are used in battery pack testing
to support the mega trend of

preferred by customers because they

Market leading test coverage which
increases quality assurance and
throughput in the fourth quarter we
receiv received several repeat orders
for these systems and we won back a

competitive solution while the pipeline
of opportunities for this technology
entering 2025 is healthy we are
carefully monitoring customer spending
given the everchanging Tariff

year-over-year core business sales
growth in defense arrow semi backend and
Life Sciences more than offset the
decline in
Industrials we also benefited from

defense arrow and auto markets due to

Innovative environmental and test

requirements for these

end
